name: Battle for Atlantis (itch)
description:
Battle for Atlantis is a Risk style strategy game I made 20 years ago (in holidays after high school - it took me 10 full days to make it). I'm still proud of it. 

It has 10 difficulty levels so anyone can try. AI is good (starting from 5 level)  :) 

And no sound. Sorry :/

It's inspired by a DOS game of the same title by William Soleau (I played this game as a kid).
